import React,{Component}from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Chart from '../components/chart.component'; // import SystemGrath from'../components/SystemGrafth.component' import '../components/Admin.css' import AdminCompNav from'../components/AdminCompNav' class Admin extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ Users:[], Requsts:[], Bugs:[], Aggregates:[], } } SetData(){ let Responses=[4,7,3,6] return({ chartData:{ labels:['pending for response','accepted','declined'], datasets:[{ label:"Requests", backgroundColor:["rgba(170, 0, 65, 0.6)", ], data:Responses }, ] } }) } async dataAsamble(){ let Users; let Requsts; let Bugs; let Aggregates; await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/users/") .then((res)=>Users=res.data); await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/Request/`) .then((res)=>Requsts=res.data) await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/Bug/`) .then((res)=>Bugs=res.data) await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/AGGREGATE/`) .then((res)=>Aggregates=res.data) this.setState({ Users:Users, Requsts:Requsts, Bugs:Bugs, Aggregates:Aggregates }) } CalcAggre(){ if(this.state.Aggregates) { let Total=0; let Amount=0; this.state.Aggregates.forEach(Aggre=>{ Total+=Aggre.TotalAmount; Amount+=Aggre.Amount; }) return(<>{parseInt((Amount/Total)*100)}%) }else{ return(<> Loading) } } componentDidMount(){ this.dataAsamble() } render(){ console.log(this.state.Aggregates) return(

Dashboard

{" Users"}

{this.state.Users.length}

{" 5.27%"} Since last month

{" Storage"}

{this.CalcAggre()}

{" 5.27%"} Since last month

{" Requests"}

{this.state.Requsts.length}

{" 5.27%"} Since last month

{" Bugs"}

{this.state.Bugs.length}

{" 5.27%"} Since last month

)} } export default Admin /*

Hello {this.props.User.username}
